cards.title: The Life Aquatic
cards.extraText: Bacon ipsum dolor amet bresaola kevin tenderloin swine shoulder strip steak t-bone picanha turducken beef. Ribeye turkey t-bone pastrami meatball corned beef. Pork belly landjaeger short ribs ground round cupim, brisket ham tri-tip. Pig pork loin hamburger picanha ribeye, pork belly meatball chicken ham boudin sirloin corned beef frankfurter ham hock.
